location: Tidi Boulevard Section 2, Zhongshan District, near Wenhu Elementary School MRT Station (37m) and Xilu Station (574m)
notes: Spacious 46-ping 2BR/2BA apartment on floors 7-10 of an elevator building with 24-hour hotel-style management and full public amenities. Comes fully furnished (fridge, washer, TV, AC, bed, wardrobe, sofa, desk) with natural gas and flat parking included. Description highlights excellent lighting, ventilation, and a rectangular layout. The two balconies require baby-safety inspection for railing height and gap width. NT$5,000/month management fee is additional. No pets allowed. Proximity to Wenhu Elementary School Station is excellent for transit. Red flags: agent listing with generic praise language â€” verify condition in person. The NT$90,000 price plus NT$5,000 management fee is on the higher end but reasonable for this size and location with hotel-style management.
